name: Pink Onion
author: Gautam G.
description:
Man, this place made me have so many feelings about pizza that I didn't know were possible.

I've never really been into "fancy" pizza -- I usually reserve it for the nights where I'm desperate for food or just need some quick greasy satisfaction.

But Pink Onion changes everything. Pink Onion is art. 

I will wholeheartedly say Pink Onion is the best pizza I've had in my life.
(Ok, I haven't been to Italy before, so maybe my opinion doesn't matter. But my friends who *have* been agreed this place was really damn good.)

I usually stick to the Magic Mushroom pizza (it's not *too* mushroom-y, and the black truffles on top are amazing), but every pizza on the menu seems solid. Try the Sicilian style pizzas for something a little different!

The staff here is wonderful and I love how excited they are about their food --Â it's always a pleasure to come back here.

(Pro tip: the Sangiovese on the menu goes unbelievably well with pizza. Like, they were made to be together.)
